author: David C
title: Ham Yard Hotel stay in London, England
text:
Wonderful hotel and it is immaculate. It's, beautifully decorated and very stylish. The staff were very accommodating and wanted to ensure our stay was outstanding. Afternoon tea is a must. Spa treatment was very relaxing and they scheduled my appointment to accommodate my schedule.
Room Tip: We had a corner room that was large and sunny See more room tips
